headline: How Recent Developments Are Rewriting the Story for Yum! Brands
summary: Yum! Brands’ stock is drawing heightened attention as the consensus analyst price target has climbed from $161.40 to $165.56. This signals increased optimism about its future prospects. This adjustment comes amid recent analyst reports that balance newfound bullishness on acquisitions and operating momentum with lingering concerns around costs and competition. Read on to discover what is shaping expert expectations for Yum! Brands and how you can stay informed as this evolving story continues...

headline: Yum! Brands, Pizza Hut And The Billion-Dollar Slice: A Sale Could Unlock Tremendous Value
summary: Yum! Brands is considering a sale of Pizza Hut. Read how a deal could unlock value and allow focus on core growth engines Taco Bell and KFC.
